mapper.select: select ppmt.id_product_main_type as "id", ppmt.business_owner as "businessOwner", ppmt.business_line as "businessLine", ppmt.product_type as "productType", ppmt.product_no as "productNo", ppmt.product_name as "productName", ppmt.parent_product_no as "parentProductNo", ppmt.dept_code as "deptCode", ppmt.remark as "remark", ppmt.created_by as "createdBy", ppmt.date_created as "dateCreated", ppmt.updated_by as "updatedBy", ppmt.date_updated as "dateUpdated" from pms_product_main_type ppmt where ppmt.product_type = 'MAIN'

select ppmt.parent_product_no as "parentProductNo", (select in_ppmt.product_name from pms_product_main_type in_ppmt where in_ppmt.product_no = ppmt.parent_product_no) as "parentProductName", ppm.product_no as "productNo", ppm.version_no as "versionNo", ppmt.product_name as "productName", ppm.effective_date as "effectiveDate", ppm.status as "status" from pms_product_management ppm, pms_product_main_type ppmt where ppm.product_no = ppmt.product_no and ppmt.product_type = 'SUB'
and str_to_date(ppm.effective_date,'%Y-%m-%dd')<=sysdate() and not exists (select 1 from pms_product_management in_ppm where ppm.product_no = in_ppm.product_no and in_ppm.status = 'PUBLISHED' and str_to_date(in_ppm.effective_date,'%Y-%m-%dd')<=sysdate() and ppm.effective_date <= in_ppm.effective_date and ppm.version_no < in_ppm.version_no )
order by ppmt.product_no
